response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1,350,000. This price reflects a fair assessment of its value while allowing me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.", "product_price": 1350000}
